context: Can you tell me the name of some books written by Anthea Bell?
resp: Sure! Anthea Bell wrote Tintenherz, Tintenblut, and Rubinrot. Have you read any of those?

context.content: Hello

The movie combines futuristic sci-fi elements with suspenseful thriller as the characters navigate the dangerous maze and uncover the dark secrets behind their predicament.
